news.title: Berkshire Hathaway Adds Nearly $600M In Occidental Petroleum Stock After Permian Basin Acquisition
news.description: Warren Buffett's conglomerate increased its ownership of Occidental this week, signaling approval of the Houston-based oil company's purchase of CrownRock.

news.title: The Great Comeback Of The Greek Economy
news.description: Today, the Greek economy has rebounded to a new normal, contributing to the European stability. The country is witnessing healthy Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth, while the Debt to GDP ratio is declining.

news.title: Gas Prices For US Consumers Reach Two-Year Low As Holiday Travel Season Approaches
news.description: Record domestic oil output is driving down gas prices.

news.title: Small Modular Nuclear Reactors' Viability In Future Green Energy Grids Questioned
news.description: A cutting-edge nuclear technology is still in its infancy and beset by financial and environmental concerns.

news.title: Pfizer Expects To Complete Purchase Of Seagen On Thursday
news.description: Pfizer announced Tuesday that it expects to complete this week its $43 billion acquisition of cancer-focused biotech company Seagen after clearing key regulatory hurdles.

news.title: Taiwan's Gogoro Unveils Its First India-Made Electric Scooter, Plans To Expand Battery Swapping Ecosystem
news.description: Founder and CEO Horace Luke said the company was open to making a multi-billion dollar investment to develop the battery swapping infrastructure across by 2024 in India.

news.title: Rising Cyberattacks Prompt Bond Markets' Innovative Response To Combat Risk
news.description: Many organizations and municipalities are coping by purchasing cyber liability insurance, which offers coverage for things like data recovery and legal fees.

news.title: President Biden's AI Legislation: A Crucial Step Toward American Technological Leadership
news.description: The proposed measures aim to bolster the U.S.' standing in the global tech race, shaping the future of AI research, development and application in the U.S.

news.title: AI-Powered Metahumans Are Driving Indonesia's Digital Transformation
news.description: AI and metahumans are gaining much attention in Indonesia's influencer marketing sector, but it may play a greater role in driving the country's digital transformation as more industries explore possibilities with AI-infused digital avatars.

news.title: Musk Says X Will Scrap 'Block' Feature
news.description: Elon Musk said Friday his social media company X would scrap a feature that allows users to block posts from specific accounts.

news.title: Sam Altman's Return Ushers In New Era At OpenAI
news.description: Sam Altman's shock return as chief executive of OpenAI late Tuesday -- days after being sacked -- caps a chaotic period that highlighted deep tensions at the heart of the Artificial Intelligence community.

news.title: Unveiled: The Most Followed Celebrities On Social Media In 2024
news.description: The 38 most-followed celebrities featured in this list have navigated the digital landscape with finesse, leveraging their social media platforms not only for self-promotion but also as powerful tools for activism, philanthropy, and meaningful conversations.
